title: Integration Failure with 3rd Party App
description: A customer reports that the integration with a third-party application (e.g., Salesforce) has stopped syncing.

tasks.description: Check the integration logs for connection errors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds 'Authentication Failure' errors in the logs.

tasks.description: Hypothesize that the API key or password for the third-party app has expired or been changed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the likely root cause.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to re-authenticate the integration by entering their current credentials for the third-party app.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions that resolve the syncing issue.
